summary_comment: Professor LaVallie is known for his engaging and effective teaching methods, making the material easy to understand through memory techniques. He emphasizes preparation and attendance, offering opportunities for leadership and group projects. Students find his approach straightforward and highly effective for achieving high grades.
summary_comment_short: Professor LaVallie is known for his engaging and effective teaching methods, employing memory techniques to simplify learning and improve retention. His approach ensures that students who engage with the provided materials and commit to memorization can achieve high grades, with attendance and participation in group projects and leadership roles also contributing to overall performance.

Ratings.comment: He teaches the material with a lot of memory techniques that makes the work easier. As long as you read the material provided and memorize it, you should get an A. Attendance is graded, and there are several group projects and options of student leadership in class.
